dict.acceptation: 乳；牛奶；（椰子等植物的）白色汁液；乳液；
产奶，挤奶；套出；榨取，压榨；

sent.orig: The water started to dry autumn and winter, course, to Cleanser (milk) .
sent.trans: 开始干燥缺水的秋冬季，当然要交给洁面乳(milk)。

sent.orig: Of course, milk, coconut milk, milk, almond milk, soy pudding, and so on are good substitutes.
sent.trans: 当然，羊奶、椰奶、豆奶、杏仁奶、豆粉布丁等也都是不错的代用品。

sent.orig: Beer milk: milk, goat's milk,'s milk by adding beer.
sent.trans: 奶啤酒：把牛奶、羊奶、马奶加入啤酒中。

sent.orig: The milk industry line is composed of market, milk product processing enterprises and milk source.
sent.trans: 奶业产业链由市场、乳品加工企业和奶源组成。

sent.orig: Whether adult milk powder, liquid milk and milk products like yogurt also contains melamine.
sent.trans: 是否成人奶粉、液态奶和酸奶这样的奶产品也含有三聚氰胺的情况。
